mapper.sql: PEOPLE_NO, PEOPLE_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, INDUSTRY, PROFESSION, VALIDITY, COUNTYR, CITY, DATA_STAT, BUSINESS_LICENSE, ORGANIZATION_CODE, TAX_REGISTRATION, UPDATE_DATE, RS1, RS2, RS3, EMAIL, NATION, EDUCATION, MARRIAGE, ISVALIDITY, RISK_GRADE, ISBLACKLIST
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from SVC_MNG.TB_PEOPLE_ATTACH_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SVC_MNG.TB_PEOPLE_ATTACH_INFO (PEOPLE_NO, PEOPLE_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, INDUSTRY, PROFESSION, VALIDITY, COUNTYR, CITY, DATA_STAT, BUSINESS_LICENSE, ORGANIZATION_CODE, TAX_REGISTRATION, UPDATE_DATE, RS1, RS2, RS3, EMAIL, NATION, EDUCATION, MARRIAGE, ISVALIDITY, RISK_GRADE, ISBLACKLIST) values (#{peopleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopleType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxRegistration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rs1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rs2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rs3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{marriage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isvalidity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{riskGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isblacklist,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update SVC_MNG.TB_PEOPLE_ATTACH_INFO
ENTITY_ID = #{entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDITY = #{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_STAT = #{dataStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAX_REGISTRATION = #{taxRegistration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
RS1 = #{rs1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where PEOPLE_NO = #{peopleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PEOPLE_TYPE = #{peopleType,jdbcType=CHAR}

update SVC_MNG.TB_PEOPLE_ATTACH_INFO set ENTITY_ID = #{entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFESSION = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALIDITY = #{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTYR = #{countyr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_STAT = #{dataStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_CODE = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAX_REGISTRATION = #{taxRegistration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, RS1 = #{rs1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RS2 = #{rs2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RS3 = #{rs3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATION = #{education,jdbcType=CHAR}, MARRIAGE = #{marriage,jdbcType=CHAR}, ISVALIDITY = #{isvalidity,jdbcType=CHAR}, RISK_GRADE = #{riskGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISBLACKLIST = #{isblacklist,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PEOPLE_NO = #{peopleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PEOPLE_TYPE = #{peopleType,jdbcType=CHAR}

update SVC_MNG.TB_PEOPLE_ATTACH_INFO
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
ISVALIDITY = #{isvalidity,jdbcType=CHAR},
where VALIDITY !='' and to_date(VALIDITY, 'yyyy-MM-dd')<to_date(#{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')
where VALIDITY !='' and ( days(to_date(VALIDITY,'yyyy-MM-dd'))-days(to_date(#{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')))>=0 and ( days(to_date(VALIDITY,'yyyy-MM-dd'))-days(to_date(#{validity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd')))<=30
mapper.select: SELECT PEOPLE_NO, PEOPLE_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, INDUSTRY, PROFESSION, to_char(to_date(VALIDITY,'yyyyMMdd'),'yyyyMMdd') AS "VALIDITY", COUNTYR, CITY, DATA_STAT, BUSINESS_LICENSE, ORGANIZATION_CODE, TAX_REGISTRATION, UPDATE_DATE, RS1, RS2, RS3, EMAIL, NATION, EDUCATION, MARRIAGE, ISVALIDITY, RISK_GRADE, ISBLACKLIST FROM SVC_MNG.TB_PEOPLE_ATTACH_INFO WHERE PEOPLE_NO = #{peopleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PEOPLE_TYPE = #{peopleType,jdbcType=CHAR}
